column1: #text=For my first time flying in an airplane I ca n't say that I was too scared .
#text=I mean what could be so scary about being in a plane .
#text=I was pumped and ready for my first flight .
#text=But first things first , I had to pack my suitcase .
#text=With this finished and my plane ticket purchased online -LRB- boy that 's convenient -RRB- I began the long wait for departure day .
#text=When It came I rushed to the airport in my car , maybe a little too fast according to the driver who honked and put up a very rude message with one of his fingers .
#text=Whatever , nothing can deter me from this flight .
#text=I arrive at the airport and get processed .
#text=I jump on my plane and wait for departure .
#text=This is the moment I 've been waiting on .
#text=And once I look out the window I am terrified , I should have never done this .
#text=The flight takes a couple hours and then I am good .
